posts.post_content:
I've bought 4 via straight sales from members, and won 4 auctions in the last few months.  Also acquired 2 via trade.  So I think I am paying very fair prices.  

I am mainly looking for lower grade, presentable examples, but would consider mid-grades.  I have 2 low grade Hindu HOFers to trade as well as many other HOFers.  And of course, I can purchase.  I may not be able to afford the top 3 on my list at the moment (depending on grade), but would still love to see what's out there.  

Here is my want list:

Johnson Portrait (R) (HOF)
Young Portrait (HOF)
Mathewson Portrait (HOF)
Lajoie Portrait (HOF)
Walsh (HOF)
Tinker Portrait (HOF)
Brown Portrait (HOF)
Joss Portrait (HOF)
Evers Portrait (HOF)
McGraw Portrait, No Cap (HOF)
Griffith Portrait (HOF)
Bresnahan Portrait (HOF)
Lajoie Throwing (HOF)
Mathewson White Cap (HOF)
Tinker Hands on Knees (HOF)
Marquard Hands at Side (R) (HOF)
Brown Cubs (HOF)
Evers Cubs (blue sky) (HOF)

Thanks for looking!
